contentList.content: Autosorting containers for your arrows, scrolls, grenades, letters, books, weapon coatings and potions.
The history of this magical quiver has been long forgotten, though it likely had something to do with the inexplicable but well documented shortage of competent fletchers during the Time of Troubles.
This sturdy container allows dozens of scrolls to be placed in it, safe from exposure to fire, rain, or lighting â€” common hazards faced by any adventuring wizard.

Typically carried by traveling healers, this leather case folds open and allows the user to strap delicate potion bottles to its cushioned side with numerous leather thongs for safe storage during travel.
Rarely used these days, the Bomber Devil is still one of the most practical ways to carry explosive items.
Typically carried by assassins, this leather case folds open and allows the user to strap delicate poison bottles to its cushioned side with numerous leather thongs for safe storage during travel.
